long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is active only on https://habr.com

Ads a ban-unban form on the top of the habr.com page

Replaces comments of banned users by "Habracleaned" label

The list of banned users is stored as a json string in your Chrome Local Storage on the key "habracleaner"
